Job Responsibilities: 
 Site inspection for civil works, which includes Pile & shallow foundation, PCC, 
Waterproofing, RCC and Shuttering, Steel fixing, casting concrete, masonry for 
brick works and plastering tile fixing Etc. up to completion.

works. 
 Prepare checklist for barbending schedule, Concrete works Etc. 
 Ensure that all the works meets the stipulated quality standards. 
 Issuing site instructions against violations at site.
